en.nothing-desc: There are currently no events. Follow the bot news to know the date of the next one!
en.nothing-prices: There is nothing to gain for this event :confused:
en.soon: An event is coming soon! Watch for information as it will begin on %{date}
en.xp-howto: You can earn event points by winning tic-tac-toe games, using event commands when available, or by performing various other secret tasks. Don't hesitate to come to the support server to ask for information!
